response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to us at $1,500,000. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its intrinsic value and provides an opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. We trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further.", "product_price": 1200000}
